name: Pizza Maker 3d: Cooking Game
description:
Hey Kids are you starving? Delicious and yummy pizza is the favorite of most kids. Do you love yummy pizza too? Well off course every one loves it. But can you bake it all by yourself in pizza house kitchen? If your answer is no then you don’t have to worry any more since fast food fever is back especially for the home cooking chef because we bring a world of flavor into your life with the pizza maker 3D. In my pizza maker games bake your own delicious pizza and make this a mouthwatering experience with pizza maker 3d. Be the best baker & maker the world has ever seen! So what pizza toppings do you like the most Pepperoni, Mushrooms, Onions, Sausage or bacon? We have gathered world best ingredients & recipes in our kitchen to make it happen for you. Cooking girls! grab your aprons and pepperoni, bake some amazing pizzas as you are a top chef in kids cooking world who is cooking in the kitchen & bring baking fever on. With more than 100 food toppings to choose from including veggies, meats, cheeses, herbs, spices & seafood to sure the pizza cooking fever. Pizza maker 3D is an absolutely amazing cooking and baking games for girls and kids who love to play my pizza maker games.

Pizza maker 3d cooking games for girls gives chance to become a professional pizza shop chef and create a perfect and yummy tasty pizza each and every time. You get to make your own sauce, grate cheese, cut vegetables and serve up a delicious homemade pizza cooked by you! With just a little practice cooking girls will become as good as an authentic Italian cooking chef and a pizza master! Start your day in the kitchen where all food ingredients are placed on the shelf of pizza shop. Experience the true baking fever by being a pizza maker & baker as a real chef in piza shop. In a large bowl you have to add water, flour, butter and yeast. Mix it well add salt and mix it again. Roll the mixture with rolling pin than add tomatoes, cheese, mushrooms or what ever toppings you like on the countertop, than put it in the oven and watch it as the crust becomes brown, see how the cheese melts and all other ingredients cook to perfection. So quench your kitchen cooking fever & be a master pizza cooking chef and bake some delicious and mouthwatering pizzas.

Pizza Maker 3D Features:
* Bake pizza dough from scratch, add & mix the ingredients and stretch out the dough with a rolling pin in pizza house.
* Chop the onion, capsicum, mushroom, and cheese ready to mix in with your meal
* Mix and cook all the ingredients together until it is boiling hot and yummy smelling
* Spread the sauce over the pizza ready for the ingredients to be spread
* Tons of toppings including Pepperoni, Mushrooms, Onions, Sausage or bacon etc.
* Endless combinations to make any tasty pizza you desire.
